data.title: Alle nieuwe & recente manga's zijn online beschikbaar bij De Poort
data.meta_description: Ontdek de nieuwste Manga's, alle auteurs en reeksen, online op voorraad bij De Poort. In de winkel of verstuurd naar Vlaanderen & Nederland wia de webwinkel
data.text:
I Got a Cheat Skill in Another World... - 5

Volume 5

Author Miku Minatogawa Kazuomi Kuwashima Rein

It’s time for the Ousei Academy camping trip! Yuuya and his classmates head into the wilderness, where they’ll need to build shelters, find food, and otherwise fend for themselves. Yuuya quickly steals the show (and several of his classmates’ hearts) after saving the day, thanks to his maxed-out survival skills! And back in the other world, the day Yuuya promised to meet Princess Lexia has arrived. But an ambush cuts their reunion short when...

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Bakemonogatari - 22

Volume 22

Author Nisioisin Oh! Great

Read more

Soft cover - €13.95

Ogami-san Can't Keep It In - 6

Volume 6

Author Yoshidamaru Yu

Fantasies run wild as thirsty high school girl Ogami-san must learn to keep her thoughts, and hands, to herself, in this raunchy coming-of-age romcom with a bizarre, blabbermouth twist! Ogami-san has been keeping a dirty little secret from her peers at school: Puberty has emptied her mind of everything but perverted fantasies! For the sake of leading an ordinary school life, she pulls out all the stops to keep her mental wild side under...

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Kusunoki's Flunking Her High School Glow-Up - 1

Volume 1

Author Mii Mitsuki

Read more

Soft cover - €14.99

I Was Reincarnated as the 7th Prince so I Can Take My Time Perfecting My Magical Ability - 13

Volume 13

Author Circle Kenkyo na Kokuzawa Yosuke

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Zom 100 - Bucket List of the Dead - 15

Volume 15

Author Aso Haro Takata Kotaro

Izuna has snapped into the team leader role with panache, but the final boss’s recovery ability puts the gang in desperate straits! Later, in Hakata, Kencho takes a trip back home, but will he find his family’s house still standing? And just who is it that he’s left the group to go searching for?

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

The Way of the Househusband - 12

Volume 12

Author Oono Kousuke

Tatsu must help Masa move his operation to a new pad, and fast, after the cocky kid lands himself in trouble with the wrong enforcer—his landlady! There’s just one catch—the kid lacks the funds to make any big moves. Luckily for Masa, the Immortal Dragon has some househusband tricks up his sleeve to transform even the cheapest, shadiest apartment into a comfortable crib!

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

Mission: Yozakura Family - 12

Volume 12

Author Gondaira Hitsuji

Tsubomi Yozakura comes to Taiyo in his dreams, asking him to kill her! She tells him that in order to do so, he’ll need two things. Following her instructions, Taiyo decides to take on the silver-rank spy advancement exam. Unfortunately for him, the test proctors are all Yozakura siblings...!

Read more

Soft cover - €12.99

Magilumiere Magical Girls Inc. - 3

Volume 3

Author Iwata Sekka Aoki Yu

It’s Kana’s first big assignment as a Magilumiere magical girl, and she’s excited to put all the knowledge she’s gained from reading piles and piles of books to good use! She and senior Magilumiere magical girl Koshigaya are assigned to a tricky kaii outbreak, but thanks to all her research, Kana is quick to suggest an efficient solution. So why is President Shigemoto rejecting her idea for being against company principles?!

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

Jujutsu Kaisen - 23

Volume 23

Author Akutami Gege

A mysterious cursed spirit with a grudge against Maki flies into Sakurajima Colony. It evolves with incredible speed from cursed womb to adult form and threatens to overwhelm Maki and Noritoshi. Just then, two more combatants join the battle...

Read more

Soft cover - €12.99

I Wanna Do Bad Things with You - 1

Volume 1

Author Yutaka

After discovering that Fuji lives in the shadow of his popular and perfect younger brother, nicknamed “the Prince” by all the girls at school, Mamori offers to help Fuji derail his brother’s campaign for student council president. But as Fuji’s audacious pranks pull them closer together, Mamori discovers there’s more to like about Fuji than his just villainy.

Read more

Soft cover - €12.99

Hirayasumi - 2

Volume 2

Author Shinzo Keigo

After developing an unlikely friendship with the grouchy old woman who lives in his neighborhood, Hiroto suddenly finds himself inheriting not just her house but some rather difficult emotions as well. His 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi, moves in with him, but as a struggling art student, she has her own troubles to deal with and may just put Hiroto’s easygoing lifestyle to the test.

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

Fangirl - 4

Volume 4

Author Rainbow Rowell Maggs Sam Nam Gabi

Cath and Levi are officially dating—finally!—but Cath still has a lot on her plate as the end of freshman year approaches. She only has a few more weeks to save her grade in Fiction Writing, her twin sister, Wren, is acting increasingly reckless, and an unexpected reunion with her mother has thrown everything off-balance. Plus, with the release date for the last Simon Snow novel looming, Cath is struggling to focus on anything except...

Read more

Soft cover - €17.99

A Business Proposal - 6

Volume 6

Author NARAK Haehwa

Hari and Taemu have finally taken the “fake” out of “fake dating,” and their very real romance is in full bloom! In a classic office relationship moment, Hari finds chocolates and flowers on her desk... except they’re not from Taemu? Who could be her secret admirer? And what will her real boyfriend do when he finds out?

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

The Villainess Turns the Hourglass - 4

Volume 4

Author Antstudio SANSOBEE

In a shocking turn of events, Asher has turned out to be Prince Asterope—Crown Prince of the Empire! Aria’s new ally is a more powerful figure than she imagined, and despite everything that’s happened between them in the past, she can’t help but think fondly of him. Meanwhile, with Lady Sarah’s engagement to Marquis Vincent right around the corner, Aria makes her first grand entrance into high society. With an admirer of royal background and a...

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

Solo Leveling - 9

Volume 9

Author Dubu (Redice Studio) Chugong

Seeking answers, Jinwoo answers the call of the system and returns to the double dungeon that started it all. Meanwhile, after the loss of their strongest hunters, the Japanese government finds themselves struggling with particularly nasty gate and seeks outside help. Will Jinwoo be able to stop the magic beasts before they lay waste to Japan?

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

Bungo Stray Dogs - 24

Volume 24

Author Harukawa Sango Asagiri Kafka

Together with their partners, Dazai and Dostoyevsky engage in a deadly battle of minds as they blitz through the security of Meursault. Sigma seeks to steal the secrets of Dostoyevsky’s skill, but such a prize will not come without its price. Meanwhile, Atsushi agonizes over what he’s learned, only to be forced once again to fight against Akutagawa—now a vampire. With the struggle for One Order coming to a head, who will come out on top?!

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

I Kept Pressing the 100-Million-Year Button and Came Out on Top - 6

Volume 6

Author Tsukishima Syuichi Mokyu Shido Yutaro

At the beginning of the second semester, every high school swordcraft academy is raring to compete in the Sword Master Festival, a major tournament for swordfighters. In this prestigious competition, there’s an opportunity for a single first-year student to participate, provided they win the First-Year Tourney. Who will be the one to receive the coveted slot!?

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

The Illustrated Guide to Monster Girls - 4

Volume 4

Author Akeko Suzu

The monster girls fought, went at each other’s throat, got kidnapped, sabotaged one another, killed and were killed. But it’s now time to part ways and graduate...except they’re still first-years?!

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Oshi No Ko - 7

Volume 7

Author Akasaka Aka Yokoyari Mengo

The 2.5D stage play adaptation for Tokyo Blade opens at last! As Kana and Akane battle it out through their performances, can Aqua overcome his trauma and find a way to perform “emotional acting”?

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Unholy Blood - 3

Volume 3

Author Lim Lina

It’s time for Hayan’s second fight against an Angel of Death! But Sahan’s hypnosis powers make him a much more formidable opponent than Luci—one wrong move, and Hayan will put the lives of innocent students at risk. And with Sahan leveraging the memories of Father Michael’s death against her, even Hayan’s pureblood prowess might not be enough to stop him...

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

The Star Seekers - 4

Volume 4

Author HYBE TOMORROW X TOGETHER

While all Star One want to do is perform for their fans and use their magical powers for good, they find themselves in the crossfires of a larger conflict! On one side is the Dragon Slayer Clan, a masked group that seem to take every chance to attack them. On the other side is the Dragon Sect, who seem friendly enough, but their motivations remain a mystery. When Viken discovers some uncomfortable truths about both sides, Star One finds...

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

Bocchi the Rock! - 4

Volume 4

Author Hamazi Aki

Kessoku band’s successfully cleared the first stage of the Unidentified Riot music festival! But with more trials yet to come, can Bocchi hold it together and give her all in front of SIDEROS and the other powerhouse bands...?!

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

The World After the Fall - 7

Volume 7

Author Undead Gamja singNsong S-Cynan

Jaehwan’s group is on the verge of achieving the centuries-long dream of all Chaos residents—taking back the life-giving Fruits! But the opponent is a Master said to be one of the strongest in the Great Realm. In order to seize the victory, Jaehwan must awaken the next stage of his powers!

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

Black Night Parade - 4

Volume 4

Author Nakamura Hikaru

THE POWER OF... REINDEER?! The Reindeer exam is over and winter is approaching at Santa Claus House. Hino Miharu, a promising candidate to become the next Red Santa, returns to his home in Japan for a break, but his vacation is cut short when he receives a surprise gift from the company president, Knecht. Extraordinary powers have been bestowed on the newly appointed team of Reindeer, which includes Benjamin, a world-famous pro-wrestling...

Read more

Soft cover - €14.99

365 Days to the Wedding - 4

Volume 4

Author Wakaki Tamiki

ANSWERING A CONFESSION TO STAY OUT OF SIBERIA After a shock confession, things have never been so awkward between the fake couple. It was all meant to be a lie, after all! While Honjouji Rika struggles to answer him, Oohara Takuya finds himself wrapped up in his co-worker’s romantic struggles as well. It turns out relationships can be more complicated than he expected! Meanwhile, Rika’s trying to reckon with her own feelings about love and...

Read more

Soft cover - €14.99

The Summer Hikaru Died - 4

Volume 4

Author Mokumokuren

Two boys grew up together in a certain village—Yoshiki and Hikaru. One day, Yoshiki became sure that Hikaru was no longer himself. He resolved to accept the new “Hikaru,” whatever happened to his friend. But now he’s decided to research the history of “Nounuki-sama” and Kubitachi to understand what this creature truly is. The situation evolves unpredictably, outside the boys’ control. Who will make the next move, and what will they find?

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

What's Wrong with Secretary Kim? - 5

Volume 5

Author Kim MyeongMi Jeong GyeongYun

Miso finally regains her memories and learns that the boy she’d been searching for has been by her side all long. Now that Miso and Youngjun are free to bask in each other’s love, the only thing left is how to break the news to the people around them—including Miso’s unconventional father! But even as Miso and Youngjun finally start a new chapter in their lives, the truth has left Sungyeon devastated and wracked with guilt... Will past tragedy...

Read more

Soft cover - €20.99

The Tiger Won't Eat the Dragon Yet - 2

Volume 2

Author Inaba Hachi

“Let’s go look for a way to let you live longer.” In the mountains somewhere, a young dragon was captured by a beautiful female tiger. The two, once prey and predator, set out on a journey after forming a mysterious bond. Dragons live for a thousand years, but tigers only live for fewer than twenty. Can the animal pair find a way to overcome their differing lifespans and stay together for longer?

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

The Duke of Death and His Maid - 13

Volume 13

Author Inoue

ENCHANTING EVENING At last, spring has sprung! With Alice at his side, The Duke travels to speak with his mother once again, only to find the main house abuzz with preparations for the evening ball! It promises to be a night to remember for the Duke, Viola, and Walter. On this magical night, who dances with whom?

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Ragna Crimson - 13

Volume 13

Author Kobayashi Daiki

In this action-packed dark fantasy, humanity lives under the threat of annihilation by immensely powerful dragons. The dragon hunter Ragna embarks on a revenge-fueled quest to eliminate that threat once and for all! Armed with knowledge of the future, Ragna joins the Solarian Church in a bid to prevent its imminent collapse. But his behavior soon incurs the wrath of his new comrades, including a young girl destined to become his mentor and a...

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

Goldfish - Het avontuur - 2

Deel 2

Author Yaa Nana

Niet alles wat glimt is goud... Zeg hallo tegen Morrey Gibbs! Hij is een vissersjongen in een wereld vol gevaarlijke gemuteerde dieren die erachter komt dat alles wat hij aanraakt opeens in goud verandert. Dat klinkt geweldig, maar gouden onderbroeken zijn toch niet zo comfortabel. Samen met zijn nieuwe vrienden gaat Morrey op een zoektocht om van zijn zegen, die een vloek is geworden, af te komen en de tragedie die het heeft veroorzaakt...

Read more

Soft cover - €10.99

Goldfish - Het avontuur - 1

Deel 1

Author Yaa Nana

Niet alles wat glimt is goud... Zeg hallo tegen Morrey Gibbs! Hij is een vissersjongen in een wereld vol gevaarlijke gemuteerde dieren die erachter komt dat alles wat hij aanraakt opeens in goud verandert. Dat klinkt geweldig, maar gouden onderbroeken zijn toch niet zo comfortabel. Samen met zijn nieuwe vrienden gaat Morrey op een zoektocht om van zijn zegen, die een vloek is geworden, af te komen en de tragedie die het heeft veroorzaakt...

Read more

Soft cover - €10.99

Hate Me, but Let Me Stay - 1

Volume 1

Author Hijiki

A Boys’ Love omegaverse manga where love blossoms even in the darkest of times. Ever since the assault that led to his unexpected pregnancy as a teen, Koga Naoto, an omega, has harbored a deep fear and distrust toward alphas. He’s even convinced himself that he doesn’t need a mate. After all, hasn’t he raised his daughter, Shizuku, just fine on his own? Still, at the behest of his concerned mother, Naoto reluctantly attends a matchmaking...

Read more

Soft cover - €15.98

You Like Me, Not My Daughter?! - 4

Volume 4

Author Nozomi Kota Azuma Tesshin Giuniu

TROUBLE IN PARADISE The annual Aterazawa and Katsuragi family trip to Hawaiian Z has finally arrived. But with Ayako and Takumi’s relationship still up in the air, and Miu having declared her intent to steal her precious Taku-nii away from her mother, things are more than a little awkward! Ayako is determined to make the best of the trip and even musters up the courage to show off a cute new swimsuit. However, it seems Miu has some tricks up...

Read more

Soft cover - €14.99

Deadpool - Samurai

Collector's pack - Delen 1+2

Author Uesugi Hikaru Kasama Sanshiro

Deadpool heeft eindelijk zijn eigen manga. En ook zijn eigen superheldenteam, want de Avengers vragen hem of hij lid wil worden van het Samurai Squad!De razendpopulaire Marvel-held Deadpool maakt zijn opwachting in de eerste Nederlandse superheldenmanga. Japanse makers, een leesrichting van achter naar voren en van rechts naar links, kortom, in alles een echte mangastrip... maar dan overgoten met een Marvel-sausje en het sarcastische...

Read more

Collector edition - €19.95

As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World - 11

Volume 11

Author Miraijin A Inoue Natsumi jimmy

Despite their severe disadvantage against the strongest cavalry in Missian, Ars not only leads his forces to victory but successfully rescues the hostages, which includes Ruper’s pregnant wife! After mourning those who died on the battlefield, Ars and his companions relax in Castle Rolto’s famous hot springs. Meanwhile, Pham ends up intercepting a surprise attack on the final stronghold—Castle Staatz!

Read more

Soft cover - €11.99

More than a Married Couple, but Not Lovers

More than a Married Couple, but Not Lovers

Author Kanamaru Yuki

Would you take an oath for a false romance, for the sake of true love? The pseudo-married couple romantic comedy between a popular girl and a loser in romance begins! Jiro Yakuin, a high school student who lacks romantic experience, is paired up with a completely opposite girl, Akari Watanabe, as part of a class called "Marriage Practical". They are required to live together and act like a married couple in order to earn the right to...

Read more

Soft cover - €23.99

Don't Be Cruel: plus+ - 3

Volume 3

Author Nekota Yonezou

Playboy Maya catches studious Nemugasa cheating on a test and to ensure his silence blackmails him into doing whatever Maya wants! This Don’t Be Cruel volume is a collection of the best exclusive side and short stories the series has to offer! Maya and Nemugasa’s relationship had a rocky start. Maya, the playboy slacker, and Nemugasa, the diligent student, have two very different personalities and live two very different lives. These...

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Given - 9

Volume 9

Author Kizu Natsuki

Sometimes a song can save your life. Love of music unites the four members of the band Given: hotheaded guitarist Uenoyama, playboy drummer Akihiko, gentle bassist Haruki, and Mafuyu, a singer gifted with great talent and burdened by past tragedy. Their struggles and conflicts may drive them apart, but their bond to the music—and to one another—always brings them back together again. Mafuyu arrives in Shibuya, where syh’s concert will be...

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Two Tails

Two Tails

Author Kifurai

University student Rara detests animals. And she absolutely hates cats. Until one fateful night when a fatal bike accident changes everything… A second chance at life beckons, but there’s a catch: She has to get her body back. The bigger catch? She’s now a cat. Armed with two tails and with a long-lost friend by her side, Rara ventures on a whimsical journey to show us the very human nature of animals, and the immense space that we carry in...

Read more

Soft cover - €14.50

Link Click - 2

Volume 2

Author LAN Studio Li Haoling

Volume 2 of the Chinese bestseller, now in English! Time Photo Studio has a new mission: Lu Guang and Cheng Xiaoshi are to visit the client's worst day in the past and deliver a few messages to the people he holds dear. Easy, right? But Cheng Xiaoshi is not the type of person to blindly follow rules, and certain events end up changing course. What will become of all this?

Read more

Hard cover - €20.99

The Death Mage - 6

Volume 6

Author Takehiro Kojima Densuke Densuke Ban! Ban!

Vandal faces down an epic threat to the ghoul grotto! Using his vast reserves of MP and unique death attribute magic, Vandal has become a hero of the ghoul grotto. However, a horde of orcs led by the noble orc Bugogan is planning an attack on his new home!

Read more

Soft cover - €13.95

Wistoria: Wand and Sword - 8

Volume 8

Author Omori Fujino Aoi Toshi

THE MAGEBLADERegarden is left reeling after a host of monsters crashes the Terminalia festival. With the Magia Vander having exhausted all their magic repairing the Great Barrier, Will and the remaining mages are the Tower’s last line of defense. Yet this enemy may be too much even for Will…unless the Icemaiden can give him the edge he needs.

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Wandance - 10

Volume 10

Author Coffee

It’s almost time to pick the team for the Dance Arena contest, but Kabo finds his heart is elsewhere. He ruminates on a surprising suggestion from Iori, but even as Kabo tries to figure out what he really wants from dance, the qualifying round draws closer, and he might not have time to polish his routine--even if he realizes he’d like to be a part of it. Ichirin isn’t the only school with their eye on this contest, either--formidable dancers...

Read more

Soft cover - €13.99

Sketchy - 3

Volume 3

Author Makihirochi

As her thirties slip by, Ako feels like she's falling behind. But a group of skateboarding girls will bring a newfound passion into her life in this reflective, relatable josei manga from the creator of Is Kichijoji the Only Place to Live? HALF-PIPE DREAMS Ako's love of skateboarding continues to grow as she goes to another lesson with her coworker, Shiho. The two of them buy their own boards and officially become skater girls! But as Ako...

Read more

Soft cover - €14.99

The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse - 13

Volume 13

Author Suzuki Nakaba

Return to the magical and thrilling world of Britannia with this new adventure from the creator of The Seven Deadly Sins, the manga that inspired the No. 1 hit Netflix Original Anime! Percival has always lived with his grandfather on the idyllic, remote God's Finger. And though Percival loves the simple life, he longs for adventure. That is, until adventure comes knocking at his door, tearing away everything he's ever known and leaving him...

Read more

Soft cover - €11.99
